TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit HierarchicalDataSourceView extends System.Object

summary.span: 以階層式資料結構，表示 控制項的節點或節點集合的資料檢視。

span.span: Represents a data view on a node or collection of nodes in a hierarchical data structure for a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 支援資料繫結架構，可讓 Web 伺服器控制項繫結至資料，並以一致的方式呈現。ASP.NET supports a data-binding architecture that enables Web server controls to bind to data and present it in a consistent fashion. 繫結至資料的 web 伺服器控制項稱為資料繫結控制項，並協助該繫結的類別則稱為資料來源控制項。Web server controls that bind to data are called data-bound controls, and the classes that facilitate that binding are called data source controls. 資料來源控制項可以代表任何資料來源： 檔案、 資料流、 關聯式資料庫、 商務物件等等。Data source controls can represent any data source: a file, a stream, a relational database, a business object, and so on. 資料來源控制項資料繫結控制項，不論來源或基礎資料的格式一致的方式呈現資料。Data source controls present data in a consistent way to data-bound controls, regardless of the source or format of the underlying data. 代表階層式資料的資料來源控制項衍生自抽象類別。Data source controls that represent hierarchical data derive from the abstract class. 您可以將資料來源控制項的資料來源控制項物件和其相關聯的檢視，對基礎資料，都由資料來源檢視物件的組合。You can think of a data source control as the combination of the data source control object and its associated views on the underlying data, which are represented by data source view objects. 階層式資料來源控制項支援它們所代表的資料的每個階層層級的階層式資料來源檢視。Hierarchical data source controls support a hierarchical data source view for each hierarchical level of data they represent. 資料來源檢視不名稱，例如相關聯的物件控制項，但均依其唯一的階層式路徑。The data source views are not named, like the objects associated with a control, but are identified by their unique hierarchical path. 資料來源檢視定義資料來源控制項的功能。Data source views define the capabilities of a data source control. 所有資料來源檢視物件，包括，支援從基礎資料來源使用的資料擷取方法，擷取的資料做為階層式清單物件。All data source view objects, including , support data retrieval from the underlying data source using the method, which retrieves a hierarchical list of data as an object. 所有的資料來源檢視物件選擇性地支援一組基本的功能，包括作業，例如， ， ，和排序。All data source view objects optionally support a basic set of capabilities, including operations such as , , , and sorting. 資料繫結控制項可以探索資料來源控制項擷取相關聯的資料來源的功能可讓您檢視使用方法，並在設計階段或執行階段，請查詢檢視。A data-bound control can discover the capabilities of a data source control by retrieving an associated data source view using the method and querying the view at design time or at run time. 目前不支援，或作業。 does not currently support , or operations. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何自類別來擷取資料，從階層式資料的儲存體，在此情況下的檔案系統。The following code example demonstrates how to derive a class from the class to retrieve data from hierarchical data storage, in this case a file system. `FileSystemDataSourceView`類別是強型別執行個體，例如可以階層式的 Web 伺服器控制項控制項繫結`FileSystemDataSource`控制項，並顯示檔案系統資訊。The `FileSystemDataSourceView` class is a strongly typed instance that enables hierarchical Web server controls such as the control to bind to a `FileSystemDataSource` control and display file system information. 基於安全考量，檔案系統資訊的資料來源控制項用於 localhost 時，才會顯示、 已驗證的案例，和與使用資料來源控制項的 Web Form 網頁所在的虛擬目錄，才會啟動。For security purposes, file system information is displayed only if the data source control is being used in a localhost, authenticated scenario, and only starts with the virtual directory that the Web Forms page using the data source control resides in. 否則，`viewPath`參數傳遞至建構函式可能會用來建立檢視，根據目前的檔案系統路徑。Otherwise, the `viewPath` parameter passed to the constructor might be used to create a view based on the current file system path. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1/CS/filesystemdatasource.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1/VB/filesystemdatasource.vb#3)]

summary.span: 取得檢視中的所有資料項目清單。

span.span: Gets a list of all the data items in the view.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回目前檢視中的資料項目的集合。The method returns an collection of data items in the current view. 您可以呼叫方法來取得物件，並逐一查看集合的資料項目。You can call the method to get an object and iterate through the collection of data items. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法中的類別，衍生自類別來擷取階層式從檔案系統的資料。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a class that derives from the class to retrieve hierarchical data from a file system. 基於安全考量，檔案系統資訊的資料來源控制項用於 localhost 時，才會顯示、 已驗證的案例，和與使用資料來源控制項的 Web Form 網頁所在的虛擬目錄，才會啟動。For security purposes, file system information is displayed only if the data source control is being used in a localhost, authenticated scenario, and only starts with the virtual directory that the Web Forms page using the data source control resides in. 否則，`viewPath`參數傳遞至檢視物件的建構函式可能會用來建立檢視，根據目前的檔案系統路徑。Otherwise, the `viewPath` parameter passed to the constructor of the view object might be used to create a view based on the current file system path. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1/CS/filesystemdatasource.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.FileSystemDataSource_1/VB/filesystemdatasource.vb#3)]
